headline: Bunge Schedules Fourth Quarter 2024 Earnings Release and Conference Call
summary: ST. LOUIS, January 10, 2025--Bunge Global SA (NYSE: BG) will announce its results for the quarter ended December 31, 2024, on Wednesday, February 5, 2025, prior to the market opening. The Company’s management will also host a conference call at 7:00 a.m. Central Time to discuss the results. A slide presentation to accompany the discussion will be posted on www.bunge.com.
